name: Shipwreck
overview: Shipwreck is an educational title about electricity and magnetism for children of 8 years and older. In this game children learn the principles, terms and practical applications of electricity. The game is based on the educational children's books by Two-Can Publishing. In the main game the player is shipwrecked on an island and has to repair a broken motorboat in order to escape from the evil clutches of "Ohm". The player will have to put all his knowledge of electricity to good use to succeed.
